message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $90 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $95.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $92 for the product.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make a small concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $94.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $93 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $91.
